definition: to confer/to grant/to bestow a title/to seal/classifier for sealed objects, esp. letters
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: In the police cordon the crowd gathered outside a lot.
sentences.chinese: 在警方封鎖線外聚集了不少圍觀羣衆。

sentences.english: After several adventures, Li made his way through the Kuomintang lines and reached Yenan.
sentences.chinese: 他歷經艱險，穿過國民黨的封鎖線，到了延安。

sentences.english: The ship was captured in running the blockade.
sentences.chinese: 該船在偷越封鎖線時被截獲。

sentences.english: The streamer has been captured in running the blockade.
sentences.chinese: 輪船在偷越封鎖線時被截獲。

sentences.english: They ran a blockade and got to the border.
sentences.chinese: 他們闖過封鎖線來到邊境地區。

definition: to fish by casting a net/to capture/to surround and seize
on call/always available/ready at all times
38th parallel, forming the DMZ border between North and South Korea
cheval de frise (a type of barrier)
